name: Real City Metro Bus Driver -Parking Simulator 2017
name_original: Real City Metro Bus Driver -Parking Simulator 2017
description:
The Brand new game of the real big Coach simulator 2017 takes you a Elevated City Bus driving experience. Step up to play a comprehensive coach bus driving school game with real traffic system. You will forget the 2016 public transporter games.
Climb into the city Coach transporter and buckle your seat belts. Pull the lever for the gigantic public transport adventure. Step up for Brand New Modern driving game. Ride the city bus around most amazing roads, bridges and underpasses. Display real bus perfect parking skills and transport the citizens & tourist.
How to Play the Newest Bus Coach Driver 2017 Simulator:
* Choose from 3 driving mode(including RWD) from gear-box
* Push full throttle race lever to accelerate
* Navigate gigantic vehicle around turns using steering bar
* Use brakes pedal near steep curves and sharp turns
* Also use for brakes for precise bus parking
* Change camera view

Drive your modern buses to the citizens stop. Experience the resident public transportation like never before.
